title: Is it possible for a rank to be broken

embed.description: Twitch is the world's leading video platform and community for gamers. More than 45 million gamers gather every month on Twitch to broadcast, watch and chat about gaming. Twitch's video platform is the backbone of both live and on-demand distribution for the entire video game ecosystem.

body:
[](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCU5Ld6GiwHKG240BRbV1WWw)


Bronze 5 
59 LP / 424W 453L 
Win Ratio 48% 
Sivir's Guardians 

I think 877 games in bronze 5/4 raises a lot of questions. I have played for a year straight without progressing very far.

replies.body: the number of easy cs you miss tilts me so hard lol
This steam should be called "How not to Play League of Legends"xD
if you have almost 900 games in bronze 5/4 thats a you thing, not a league thing.
